title: The Zappos End of Summer Sale Is Your Destination For a Whole New Wardrobe
text:
There are sales and then there are sales. This huge Zappos End of Summer is the latter, with hundreds of styles ranging from flip flops to formalwear. Through the end of the day, you can grab 20% off select styles with the code ENDOFSUMMER. There’s a lot to choose from, so we’d like to pull out a couple of highlights to get you in the mood. | Shop at Zappos >

Frye Melissa Shopper, $201: This large leather tote has an interior zip pocket, two slip pockets, and a key strap to make sure your keys don’t get lost. The magnetic closure also keeps your things secure no matter your commute.

prAna Neriah Polo, $30: Add some performance to your polo with this moisture-wicking one from prAna. The recycled polyester and organic cotton blend will keep you comfortable with quick-dry technology.

MICHAEL Michael Kors Keaton Lace Up, $58: You really can’t go wrong with a classic white sneaker. These easy-to-wear lace-ups can just as easily be worn with practically any outfit.

The North Face North Dome Long Sleeve Shirt, $34: Lightweight, breathable, and equipped with UBF 50+, this shirt will get you through anything. It’s got a touch of elastane to keep you comfy and casual.

Levi's Women’s Wedgie Straight Jeans, $50: Jeans labeled “wedgie” may not seem like a good idea, but these jeans are the exception. They hug your waist and hips without feeling constricting. If you want to show off your best assets, grab a pair of these.

Scouted is internet shopping with a pulse. Follow us on Twitter and sign up for our newsletter for even more recommendations and exclusive content. Curious about a specific product or brand? Let us know! Please note that if you buy something featured in one of our posts, The Daily Beast may collect a share of sales.
description: There’s nothing like a sale where you can get something from head to toe.
